test-case.name: CastableAs647
test-case.description: Try string literal castable as xs:QName

test-case.test: for $var in "ABC" return $var castable as xs:QName

test-case.name: CastableAs649
test-case.description: Reordering the predicates should not cause the expression to raise an error

test-case.name: CastableAs650
test-case.description: The expression should not raise a dynamic error
test-case.test: count(//employee[if (salary castable as xs:integer) then xs:integer(salary) gt 65000 else false()])

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-17
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(QName("", "lname") castable as xs:integer)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-18
test-case.description: When casting to xs:QName the source value can be a xs:QName value.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-19
test-case.description: Casting an xs:string to xs:QName works.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-20
test-case.description: Casting an empty sequence to xs:QName does not work.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-21
test-case.description: Casting an empty sequence to xs:QName? works.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-22
test-case.description: Casting an xs:untypedAtomic to xs:QName does not work.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-23
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(("one", "two") castable as xs:string?)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-24
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not('string' castable as xs:boolean)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-25
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `'true' castable as xs:boolean`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-26
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:float(1) castable as xs:float`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-27
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:float(1) castable as xs:untypedAtomic`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-28
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:float(1) castable as xs:string`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-29
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(xs:anyURI("example.com/") castable as xs:integer)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-30
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not("three" castable as xs:float)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-31
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not("three" castable as xs:integer)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-32
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not("three" castable as xs:decimal)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-33
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not("three" castable as xs:double)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-34
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not((1, 2, 3) castable as xs:integer)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-35
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(() castable as xs:integer)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-36
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `() castable as xs:integer?`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-37
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(1) castable as xs:integer?`.

test-case.name: K-SeqExprCastable-38
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(("one", "two") castable as xs:string?)`.

test-case.name: K2-SeqExprCastable-1
test-case.description: Testing castability to xs:QName where the cardinality is wrong.

test-case.name: K2-SeqExprCastable-2
test-case.description: Testing castability to xs:QName where the cardinality is wrong(#2).

test-case.name: K2-SeqExprCastable-3
test-case.description: Combine operator div with castable as.

test-case.name: K2-SeqExprCastable-4
test-case.description: Combine operator div with castable as(#2).

test-case.name: K2-SeqExprCastable-5
test-case.description: Check casting an xs:positiveInteger value to xs:double.

test-case.name: K2-SeqExprCastable-6
test-case.description: Check that an invalid xs:anyURI gets flagged as not being castable.

test-case.name: K2-SeqExprCastable-7
test-case.description: Check that an invalid xs:anyURI gets flagged as not being castable.

test-case.name: K2-SeqExprCastable-8
test-case.description: Check castability of an invalid xs:anyURI.

test-case.name: Castable-UnionType-1
test-case.description: Test the union type that should return an xs:integer value

modified.change: drop version declaration from query

test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "123" castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: Castable-UnionType-2
test-case.description: Test castability of xs:string to union type.
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "2001-01-01" castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.description: Test castability of xs:string to union type.
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "string" castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.description: Test castability of xs:untypedAtomic to union type.

modified.change: drop version declaration from query

test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; xs:untypedAtomic("123") castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.description: Test castability of xs:untypedAtomic to union type.

test-case.description: Test castability of xs:untypedAtomic to union type.
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; xs:untypedAtomic("string") castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: Castable-UnionType-7
test-case.description: Test castability of a value that is an instance of one of the atomic types in the transitive membership of the union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:unrestrictedInteger(123) castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: Castable-UnionType-8
test-case.description: Test castability of a value that is an instance of one of the atomic types in the transitive membership of the union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:unrestrictedDate("2001-01-01") castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: Castable-UnionType-9
test-case.description: Test castability of a value that is not an instance of one of the atomic types in the transitive membership of the union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; xs:gYear("2001") castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: Castable-UnionType-10
test-case.description: Test castability of a value that is an instance of the union type itself

test-case.description: Test castability of a value that is an instance of one of the atomic types in the transitive membership of the union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; xs:integer(123) castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.description: Test castability of a value that is castable to one or more of the atomic types in the transitive membership of the union type.
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; xs:date("2001-01-01") castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: Castable-UnionType-13
test-case.description: Test castability of empty sequence to a union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; () castable as s:myUnionType1

test-case.description: Test the union type that should return an xs:integer value

test-case.name: Castable-ListType-2
test-case.description: Cast the expression to the defined list type. The test should fail as the base type for the list is decimal

test-case.description: Test castability of xs:string to list type.

test-case.name: cbcl-castable-impure-001
test-case.description: Test castability of xs:date to impure union type s:impureUnionType.
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; xs:date("2001-01-01") castable as s:impureUnionType

test-case.name: cbcl-castable-impure-002
test-case.description: Test castability of xs:string to impure union type s:impureUnionType.
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "2001-01-01" castable as s:impureUnionType

test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; xs:date("1970-01-01") castable as s:restrictedUnion
